text: Great. A little tip- if there's any points they made in the interview- advice, room for improvement etc, then make sure you do a bulletpoint response along the lines of 'You Said/I did' to each eg *You said at interview I should include more X      *I did Y to show this'. Companies love applicants who act on their advice. Show character.
Just short bullets next time you are in touvh with them.
They didn’t really say any of that. They said they loved everything I did. So I’m just doing some personal projects alongside my final project at Uni, to pack out my reel a bit more!
Fantastic- so its prob just about them seeing progress.
Just hope they do make me an offer. When I sent over my new reel, what should I say? Highlight the new stuff?

It sounds like they want to offer, but don't want to do it now to avoid disrupting your course. When you send over the reel thank them for the interview, and be very specific about what you have done since. Don't worry about quantity, just have something FINISHED, and if you have it something where you have worked in a team..
